availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Rueben B. Mundy (Major in the 6th Kentucky Cavalry.)

body.p: Born in February 1837. Married in 1871 to Appiah Mundy. Major in the 6th Kentucky Cavalry.

bibl.p: Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Versailles city, Precint 10, citing enumeration district (ED) 83, sheet 14A, family 262, NARA microfilm publication T623 (Washington, D.C.: National Archives and Records Administration, 1972.); FHL microfilm 1,240,555.
